label.title: Vanity URL Dashboard

infoButton.moveAction: Mapping to this page will be removed on publication of {{pagePath}}
infoButton.notPublished: Several mappings will be set as default until publication of {{pagePath}}

publish.title: Publish confirmation
publish.content: Are you sure you want to publish vanity URLs selected? The publication will be started as a background job.

delete.title: Delete Default Mappings
delete.headline: Are you sure you want to delete the following Default URL mappings?
delete.content: Note: if you want to use this mapping on a different page, it is advised to reassign it instead of deleting it.
delete.terms: I understand that this operation cannot be undone

move.title: Move Mapping
move.content: Please enter the path to where you want to point ...
move.confirm: I understand that this move is a one way ticket !!
move.error_message: Looks like this path leads nowhere, please double check and try again.

error.invalid: This mapping is invalid: only letters, digits, dots (.), dashes (-) and no consecutive slashes (/) are allowed

publishdeletion.title: Delete Live Mappings
publishdeletion.headline: You are about to delete multiple Live Mapping URLs
publishdeletion.content: It is not possible to delete Live Mappings individually, so please note that all of the following Live Mappings will be removed

errors.InvalidMappingError_message: The vanity URL can only contain letters, digits, dots (.), dashes (-) and no consecutive slashes (/)
errors.GqlConstraintViolationException_message: URL Mapping is already used on {{existingNodePath}}
errors.MoveSiteError: Moving vanity mapping(s) in a different site is not allowed

label.publicationDeletionConfirmed: Deletion confirmed, publication job started in background
label.newMappingCreatedAndPublished: New mapping(s) added, publication job started in background
label.publicationDefaultIncomplete: you will have more than one default vanity in live for some language until the publication is complete
